title: Symbols of the Masons with Michael Schiavello
body:
Of all of the mysteries surrounding the Masonic orders, perhaps the most perplexing is their mysterious symbols. Now Michael Schiavello has come forward to reveal the secrets of Masonic symbols. We see them everywhere, as the compass & square and the All-Seeing Eye adorn many everyday objects. Many strange theories have arisen as to what these odd symbols mean. But what if the biggest secret is that there are really no secrets? Just a means of achieving greater levels of knowledge which reveals how you can transcend the material world and become closer to the creator. Learn more in this inaugural episode of Buzzsaw with Sean Stone.

Michael Schiavello, Author of, Know Thyself: Using the Symbols of Freemasonry to Improve Your Life, is a television broadcaster and sports commentator. By 16 Michael was hosting his own Sunday morning sports radio program on Southern FM and in 1996 Michael began his television career. Michael's riveting commentary style infusing excitement and humor with superb technical knowledge attracted the interest of international broadcasters. As a fight sports commentator, Michael has called more than 6000 fights in over 20 cities. He is also a long-time celebrity interviewer for radio, magazine and television.
teaser: Of all of the mysteries surrounding the Masonic orders, perhaps the most perplexing is their mysterious symbols. Now Michael Schiavello has come forward to reveal the secrets of Masonic symbols. But what if the biggest secret is that there are really no secrets?

title: Caesar’s Messiah with Joseph Atwill
body:
Has the second coming has already happened and we missed it? Joseph Atwill has uncovered evidence which suggests that the ancient Roman government spun the greatest story ever told. It was their intention to derail a decade’s long rebellion by coopting extant mythologies in the creation of a messiah sympathetic to Rome. With the close of the war, Titus Flavius would then be heralded as the returning messiah, and the right of divine rule would begin. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

While studying the two most prominent works of the 1st century – Josephus’, Wars of the Jews and the Gospels, Joseph Atwill noticed a series of parallels occurring in sequence between the military campaign of the Roman Caesar Titus Flavius and the ministry of Jesus. His findings led him to a startling new conclusion about the origins of Christianity. The results of Atwill’s research are set out in his book, Caesar’s Messiah.
teaser: Joseph Atwill has uncovered evidence which suggests that the ancient Roman government spun the greatest story ever told so that Titus Flavius would be heralded as the returning messiah and the right of divine rule could begin.

title: Shakespeare’s Secret Messiah: The Dark Lady with Joseph Atwill
body:
Though he is lauded as England’s greatest writer, the legacy of William Shakespeare may have been a sham from the beginning. Joseph Atwill’s research may have uncovered a bevy of ghost writers; primary among them is a woman named Emilia Bassano. Her writings, as Shakespeare, could have been a response to the jests inherit within the gospels, as written by the court of Titus Flavius. Now, we may have the key to deciphering the truth behind, what may have always been, fabulous tales of weaponized anthropology. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

While studying the two most prominent works of the 1st century – Josephus’, Wars of the Jews and the Gospels, Joseph Atwill noticed a series of parallels occurring in sequence between the military campaign of the Roman Caesar Titus Flavius and the ministry of Jesus. His findings led him to a startling new conclusion about the origins of Christianity. The results of Atwill’s research are set out in his book, Caesar’s Messiah.
teaser: Though he is lauded as England’s greatest writer, the legacy of William Shakespeare may have been a sham from the beginning. Joseph Atwill’s research may have uncovered a bevy of ghost writers; primary among them is a woman named Emilia Bassano.

title: Esoteric Hollywood with Jay Dyer
body:
Jay Dyer reveals the interplay of geopolitics and psychological warfare in Hollywood blockbusters. It is becoming more apparent that the movies we once saw as mere entertainment have become vehicles of propaganda and predictive programming. Fraught with esoteric symbolism and hints of disclosure these films seem to be generating greater degrees of social fragmentation. Or are we being prepared for a shift in collective consciousness?  Explore the esoteric messaging in the movies and ways we can avoid feeding the beast of mass hysteria in this interview with Sean Stone.

Jay Dyer, whose graduate work focused on the interplay of film, geopolitics, espionage and psychological warfare is the founder of JaysAnalysis which has grown to become one of the premier film and philosophy sites on the net. Jay is a public speaker, lecturer, comedian and author of the popular title, Esoteric Hollywood: Sex, Cults and Symbols in Film. Jay has authored hundreds of articles already read by millions in just the past few years.
teaser: It is becoming more apparent that movies have become vehicles of propaganda and predictive programming. Jay Dyer reveals the interplay of geopolitics and psychological warfare in Hollywood blockbusters.

title: The Shadow Government with Daniel Sheehan
body: The shadow governments of the world were not built in a day. The current institutions of control have secret roots which reach all the way through some of the most pivotal moments in human history. Daniel Sheehan exposes the detailed history and machinations of an elite power group which rose to power near the end of World War Two and continues to hold sway over many of the world’s most powerful governments.
teaser: The current institutions of control have secret roots which reach all the way through some of the most pivotal moments in human history. Daniel Sheehan exposes the detailed history and machinations of an elite power group which rose to power near the end of World War Two.

title: Connecting 9/11 and MH370 with Field McConnell
body: Field McConnell draws a correlation between the flights of 9/11 and the missing Malaysian aircraft as part of a greater plan put into action by members of a shadow government. Airline travel, statistically, has become the safest mode of travel on the planet. But what if nefarious forces could gain access to the flight controls of a massive airliner and use it as a weapon? It seems that shadow governments already have this control. All they would need is an elaborate conspiracy to tie up all of the loose ends, and Field McConnell reveals the intricate extent of these plots.
teaser: Airline travel, statistically, has become the safest mode of travel on the planet. But what if nefarious forces could gain access to the flight controls of a massive airliner and use it as a weapon? It seems that shadow governments already have this control.

title: Rise of False Flags with Richard Dolan
body: Are there any circumstances by which a government would attack its own people? Richard Dolan reports that such false flag operations have been a regular part of major governments since the 1600s. He examines many of these covert actions which gave rise to the Nazi party in Germany and may be a part of recent events in the United States. What we find is that false flags have become the most violent form of propaganda, being used for cultural conditioning and mainstream distractions. We need to understand the truth of these actions so that we can once again become empowered and no longer deceived.
teaser: Richard Dolan reports that false flag operations have been a regular part of major governments since the 1600s. Since then, false flags have become the most violent form of propaganda, being used for cultural conditioning and mainstream distractions.

title: Mainstream Consciousness and Disclosure
body: Many forces, terrestrial and beyond, are working to advance human consciousness and reveal extraterrestrial activity on our planet. David Wilcock discusses the many ways disclosure is making its way into mainstream consciousness and the importance of the villain in this process. There is an uphill battle underway as the extensive resources of the cabal are employed to keep information on E.T.s under wraps. However, ample droves evidence dwell all about us and trickles of disclosure have begun making its way into the mainstream through alternative sources. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Many forces, terrestrial and beyond, are working to advance human consciousness and reveal extraterrestrial activity on our planet. David Wilcock discusses the many ways disclosure is making its way into mainstream consciousness and the importance of the villain in this process.

title: Mind Control Guinea Pigs with John Hall
body: Dr. John Hall exposes extant technologies employed by less than scrupulous organizations, in what can be described as digital stalking and mind control. Are we willing to sacrifice our privacy for greater illusions of personal security? This is what the future looks like to many people, as microelectronics become an integral part of our daily lives and cognitive processes. They see this technology as a way to control the population by literally putting voices into peoples’ heads and controlling their emotions. Examples of such control may be seen by the mainstream exhibitions of violent outbursts from people who were previously not prone to such behaviors. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Are we willing to sacrifice our privacy for greater illusions of personal security? This is what the future looks like to many people, as microelectronics become an integral part of our daily lives and cognitive processes.

title: Baphomet: The Temple Mystery Unveiled  with Tracy Twyman
body:
Unveil the history and mystery of Baphomet with esoteric researcher, Tracy Twyman. The name of Baphomet is often hissed like a curse, but it can also be a blessing for those who see a different side of this strange, enigmatic character. First emerging from the mythos surrounding the Knights Templar, Baphomet is now and integral part of many esoteric and occult communities. What is it about this figure that has intrigued some and enraged others? Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Tracy R. Twyman is a non-fiction writer on esoteric history, mythology, occultism, and other odd topics. Her most well-known books include Clock Shavings, The Merovingian Mythos, Solomon’s Treasure, and Money Grows on the Tree of Knowledge. Her latest is Baphomet: The Temple Mystery Unveiled, co-written with Alexander Rivera ofThe AeonEye.com. Before writing books, she made a name for herself as the Editor and Publisher of a highly unique magazine entitled Dagobert’s Revenge, which was published from 1996 to 2003.
teaser: The name of Baphomet is often hissed like a curse, but it can also be a blessing for those who see a different side of this strange, enigmatic character. Unveil the history and mystery of Baphomet with esoteric researcher, Tracy Twyman

title: Amazon: the Spiritual Heart of Our World with Jordão Souza
body:
The Yawanawa people, protectors and keepers of secrets of the rainforest, have come under fire by major corporations seeking to exploit the energy resources of the Amazon basin. These rainforests of South America have been likened to the lungs of the planet, but what if they are also the spiritual heart of our world? Jordão Souza conveys the mission of the Yawanawa, who protect a bevy of treasures, ranging from medicines to the secrets of spiritual awakening. These are things which await those willing to form a deep connection with the planet and its healing power, but will be destroyed if the Amazon is lost. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Jordão de Melo e Souza is a board member of the “Indigenous Celebration” NGO that is developing projects aimed at supporting the Yawanawa people. Jordão is the grandson of Padrinho Sebastião Mota de Melo, a known religious leader in the Santa Daime tradition. In 1985 his father Paulo Roberto Silva e Souza organized and led the scientific commission that convinced the Brazilian government to legalize ayahuasca for religious uses. This exposed him from early childhood to Amazonian shamanism and spirituality.
teaser: The Yawanawa people, protectors and keepers of secrets of the rainforest, have come under fire by major corporations seeking to exploit the energy resources of the Amazon basin. These secrets await those willing to form a deep connection with the planet, but will be destroyed if the Amazon is lost.

title: The Sound of Sacred Geometry with Eric Rankin
body: Have you ever listened to the sound of a cube or tetrahedron? Eric Rankin has, and he found that perfect harmony resonates from perfect geometry. Plato once discovered shapes which he considered to be the most harmonious. But what he did not realize, is that those shapes also hold perfect musical harmony. All around us, the natural world is teeming with sacred geometry and until now, we have been completely unaware of the sacred symphony which resounds from the correlation between all of this geometry and the frequencies of sound. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Have you ever listened to the sound of a cube or tetrahedron? Eric Rankin has, and he found that perfect harmony resonates from perfect geometry. All around us, the natural world is teeming with sacred geometry and until now, we have been completely unaware of this sacred symphony.

title: Forbidden Knowledge for a New Age with Billy Carson
body: Whistleblowers are finally coming forward to reveal what they have been threatened to conceal. The power that the shadow government once held is beginning to shrink as the collective power of humanity grows. Standing at the forefront of this movement is Billy Carson. It has become his life’s mission to reveal forbidden knowledge ranging from ancient civilization texts and the Emerald Tablet to secret space programs beckoning the dawn of a new age. All the while, advanced extraterrestrial civilizations, like the Anunnaki, have played a big role in advancing human evolution since ancient history. Explore the mind of the best-selling author of the Compendium of The Emerald Tablets and podcast host of 4biddenknowledge.
teaser: The power that the dark forces once held over the world is beginning to wane as the collective power of humanity continues to wax.

title: Psychedelic Initiation for Global Transformation with Daniel Pinchbeck
body: It is theorized, that ages ago, human consciousness was boosted by psychedelic plants. Those cultures learned to coexist peacefully with each other and their environment. As human civilization progressed, we have lost this vital connection and we are running out of time to deal with the ecological disasters we are facing. Daniel Pinchbeck, author of How Soon is Now, explains that humanity is poised for a new rite of passage. Once again, psychedelic substances may hold the key to personal initiation and global transformation. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: It is theorized, that ages ago, human consciousness was boosted by psychedelic plants. Those cultures learned to coexist peacefully with each other and their environment. Daniel Pinchbeck explains that humanity is poised for a global transformation through a psychedelic initiation.

title: Rising Above the Chaos
body: After devoting years to interviewing luminaries ranging from cutting edge scientists to deep mystical intellectuals, Regina Meredith may have uncovered humanity’s higher purpose. She explains that we are beginning feel this purpose calling to us during these times when we are all desperate for a change. This desperation can even cause chaos and increased polarization as our consciousness yearns to discover the truth of its origin amid the din of mass media confusion. She explains how this social turbulence can actually be an opportunity to reach greater degrees of understanding of the self and achieve a higher degree of empowerment for all in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Regina Meredith may have uncovered humanity’s higher purpose. She explains that we are beginning feel this purpose calling to us during these times when we are all desperate for a change.

title: When Parallel Civilizations Collide with Walter Bosley
body:
Walter Bosley explains that humanity has never been alone. Deep underground, a parallel civilization has long thrived, separate from surface dwelling populaces which have been guided by the guileful hands of two opposing forces of the Annunaki. As the ages passed, tales of these civilizations became mere legend and fantasy. But when spacefaring technology was secretly developed in the early 20th century, we got their attention, once again. Now, the old ones have returned and a delicate game of exopolitics is being played out within secret organizations within the governments of the world. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Walter Bosley served as a counterintelligence specialist during the final years of the Cold War for the FBI and served as a Special Agent with the Air Force Office of Special Investigations running counterespionage operations.
teaser: Deep underground, a parallel civilization has long thrived, separate from surface dwelling populaces which have been guided by the guileful hands of two opposing forces of the Annunaki. Now, the old ones have returned and a delicate game of exopolitics is being played out.

title: The Occult: Bringing Your Will to the World with James Wasserman
body:
Public perceptions of occult practices have reaped a reputation full of malicious tidings which bode unfavorably to unsuspecting innocents. In some cases, this reputation is well earned. But, according to James Wasserman, magical workings ranging from the Templars to Aleister Crowley hold the secrets to unlocking the holiest of quests. Aspirants upon this journey seek occult secrets to learn how to look deep within and find a truth which transcends the limits of a reality created by others. These techniques can help you to take responsibility for fulfilling your own Will - which is the higher purpose that brought you into this world. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Jim Wasserman has played a key role in numerous publications of the literary corpus of the English philosopher, Aleister Crowley. Perhaps the most important includes his supervision of Weiser's 1976 edition of The Book of the Law.
teaser: Public perceptions of occult practices have reaped a reputation full of malicious tidings. In some cases, this reputation is well earned. But, according to James Wasserman, these magical workings hold the secrets to unlocking the holiest of quests.

title: Consensus Reality & the Cyberspace Revolution with David Seaman
body:
David Seaman offers an alternate take on many of the issues facing our society, including the credibility of media sources, the shifting of cannabis laws and the rise of crypto currency. There are those who will claim that the mainstream media has the power to tell us what to think and feel about the news stories which govern our lives. A call has been put out for us to rethink the future of our world and begin questioning the motivations of what appears to be an establishment press perpetuating establishment views. Thus, a fracturing of consensus reality has already begun, stemming from the cyberspace revolution.  Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

YouTuber, researcher, and cryptocurrency enthusiast he has been intrigued and in love with media for as long as he can remember. Previously a guest on CNN Headline News, BBC World Service, FOX News, ABC News Digital, Coast to Coast, RT America, Young Turks, and elsewhere.
teaser: David Seaman offers an alternate take on many of the issues facing our society, including the credibility of media sources, the shifting of cannabis laws and the rise of crypto currency.

title: Dispelling Wetiko: Transcending Collective Fear with Paul Levy
body:
Life is but a dream…in which we can awaken. This premise is suggested by Paul Levy who explains that the reality we experience is merely a collective projection which we believe to be separate and external. Lurking within the shadows of this world is a psycho-spiritual illness, inspired by and feeds off of our traumas, which he calls, Wetiko – a Native American word for an evil force. Learning how this shadow force works, embracing its unique genius and giving it a creative means of expression helps to dispel the Wetiko. Thus we can learn how to awaken in the dream and fully engage conscious evolution. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Paul Levy, author of Dispelling Wetiko, is a pioneer in the field of spiritual emergence, as well as an innovator in the field of dreaming (both night dreams as well as waking dreams).
teaser: Life is but a dream…in which we can awaken. This premise is suggested by Paul Levy who explains that the reality we experience is merely a collective projection which we believe to be separate and external. Lurking within the shadows of this world is a psycho-spiritual illness called the Wetiko.

title: The Forbidden Fruit of Psychedelics with Dennis McKenna
body: Some people can spend years meditating and engaging in various spiritual practices in hopes of achieving an authentic mystical experience. Sometimes they wind up feeling fruitless and frustrated. Ethnobotanist Dennis McKenna, Terence McKenna’s brother, tells of a forbidden fruit which can reliably induce a mystical experience – psychedelic substances taken in spiritual settings. While this is not the answer for everyone seeking a connection with the divine, it has become a profound path for others. Beyond the spiritual, certain medical studies are discovering psychological benefits of careful and controlled ingestion of certain psychoactive substances. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: There may be a forbidden fruit which can reliably induce a mystical experience – psychedelic substances taken in spiritual settings. While this is not the answer for everyone seeking a connection with the divine, it has become a profound path for others.

title: Golden Threads from the Kabbalah with Ken Hanson
body:
In the modern world, the three major Abrahamic religions continue to challenge each other, while remaining fairly oblivious to the common golden thread which ties them together. Ken Hanson deciphers the mystical tradition of the Kabbalah and discusses how it can help us understand the world in which we live. As new archeological findings continue to sustain the biblical account of history, we may find it easier to look past the religious teachings and find a chance for peace through the ancient mystical traditions which still stand in plain sight, waiting to be rediscovered.  Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Dr. Ken Hanson, author, lecturer, is devoted to disseminating knowledge of the Biblical and classical world. He has dug on archaeological sites in the Middle East, lived in a politically volatile region of northern Galilee, and taught Hebrew on an Israeli agricultural settlement. He has also worked with a television news-gathering operation in a war zone in southern Lebanon, at the height of the civil war that left the jewel of the Mediterranean in ruins.
teaser: Ken Hanson deciphers the mystical tradition of the Kabbalah and discusses how it can help us understand the world in which we live. We may find it easier to look past the religious teachings and find a chance for peace through the ancient mystical traditions.

title: Human Design: Discover Your Purpose with Richard Beaumont
body: Richard Beaumont delves into the intricacies of Human Design, which can give you a clear picture of who you are with a strategy to help you to realize your essential nature across the broad spectrum of what it means to be human. As many people struggle through life not knowing why they are here or what their purpose is. You can use this tool to delineate the course of your life, plotted out as if by divine design. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Richard Beaumont delves into the intricacies of Human Design, which can give you a clear picture of who you are with a strategy to help you to realize your essential nature across the broad spectrum of what it means to be human.

title: Ancient Grimoires and Political Influence with Peter Levenda
body: In this interview with Stean Stone, Peter Levenda reveals that the political powers which have long ruled over our planet’s populations have received guidance through contact with beings beyond our sense of reality. If we look at mythology from Greece and Egypt as tales of contact, we begin to gain an understanding of how these forces have impacted human society. Ancient grimoires contain the mystical technology used to make contact with beings which have exerted influence in every aspect of our society from religion to the secret space programs.
teaser: The political powers which have long ruled over our planet’s populations have received guidance through contact with beings beyond our sense of reality. Ancient grimoires contain the mystical technology used to make contact with these beings.

title: Traversing Astral Realms with Jason Quitt
body: In this interview with Sean Stone, Jason Quitt explains that one largely untapped potential of human consciousness is to break free from the corporeal restraints of the body and travel, astrally, to other locations, times and dimensions. His first experiences were at a young age when a shadow being would pull him from his dreams and project his consciousness to various locations and timelines. Once he got over his initial fear and the ensuing trauma, he learned how to traverse the astral on his own and reap forbidden knowledge of alternate timelines and secret machinations of multi-dimensional beings.
teaser: One largely untapped potential of human consciousness is to break free from the corporeal restraints of the body and travel, astrally. Jason Quitt discusses forbidden knowledge of alternate timelines and secret machinations of multi-dimensional beings he has reaped via his travels through the astral realms.

title: Reclaiming Control from the Annunaki with Billy Carson
body:
Billy Carson has uncovered evidence which suggests the continuing presence of an extraterrestrial civilization which has been an active part of human destiny for a very longtime. Once known as the Annunaki, these alien beings have influenced our species from the very depths of what it means to be human. He suggests that they still walk among us through institutions of finance and control. However, we have something that they will never have and once we learn to reclaim our power, they will no longer control our future.  Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.

Billy Carson is an avid blogger and social media manager of over a dozen social media accounts with followers totaling over 1 million. He is the founder of 4biddenknowledge on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr. Topics discussed range from ancient suppressed knowledge to current day events.
teaser: Once known as the Annunaki, these alien beings have influenced our species from the very depths of what it means to be human. However, we have something that they will never have and once we learn to reclaim our power, they will no longer control our future.

title: Upon the Fourth Turning with Jay Weidner
body:
Every 80 years, or so, we are forced to rethink everything that we have been doing and own up to the sins of the past. Jay Weidner explains that a great societal transformation is prone to beset the U.S. as we quickly approach the Fourth Turning. Leading the charge into this turning is the internet. As a near infinite source of knowledge, it helps our society foster an increased degree of awareness, guiding us to a techgnosis. 

To discover what is to come, we look to Hollywood movies. Hidden within the flicker of the silver screen we find symbols of gnostic initiation, major disclosures, and the keys to taking back our planet from the great magicians who have been running everything. Learn more in this interview with Sean Stone.
teaser: Every 80 years we are forced to rethink everything that we have been doing and own up to the sins of the past. Jay Weidner explains that a great societal transformation is prone to beset the U.S. as we quickly approach the Fourth Turning.

title: High-Vibration Diet for Starseeds with Bridget Nielsen
body: What does it mean to eat a high-vibration diet? Bridget Nielsen confirms that many Starseed souls, which originated on other worlds, are reincarnating on Earth and find themselves in need of higher sources of vibrational energy. She explains how we can find these high vibration foods, despite the ever-increasing availability of toxic foods that keep the populace at lower vibrational frequencies. These highly processed foods typically have toxins such as additives, artificial sweeteners, genetically modified organisms (GMOs), gluten, pesticides, and refined sugars. Higher vibration foods are known as superfoods or whole foods like fresh fruits, veggies, whole grains, legumes, nuts, seeds, and grass fed humanely raised animal proteins. They not only improve your overall health and well-being, but also provide the nourishing life force energy Star Seeds need. Explore the vibration of food and the health benefits of eating the right things.
teaser: Bridget Nielsen reveals how Starseeds can find and tap into sources of higher energy, despite the ever-increasing availability of toxic foods keeping the populace at lower vibrations.

title: Living for Death with Cyndi Dale
body:
Death is an inevitability which we all must face, and there is a way that we can spiritually prepare for the greatest adventure of our lives. Cyndi Dale offers guidance for living in ways that will prepare us to properly transcend the moment of death. Plus, she shares the seven-year phases of life, which correlate with the lessons and functions of the chakras. 

Cyndi Dale, author of The Subtle Body: An Encyclopedia of Your Energetic Anatomy has long been a natural intuitive with a passion to helping people open their essential energy. In addition to her natural intuitive gifts, she is trained in shamanism, intuitive healing, energy healing, family of origin therapy, therapeutic touch, the Lakota way and faith healing and holds a fourth degree mastership in Reiki.
teaser: Death is an inevitability which we all must face, and there is a way that we can spiritually prepare for the greatest adventure of our lives. Cyndi Dale offers guidance for living in ways that will prepare us to properly transcend the moment of death.

title: Ancient Events in an Electric Universe with David Talbott
body:
In ancient times, the Earth and heavens appeared vastly unlike the world we know today. With the Thunderbolt Project, David Talbott explains that electricity, arcing across the solar system, had a powerful effect on events in the ancient world. This may have served as provocation for many of the myths which have persisted across the ages.

David Talbott is the author of The Saturn Myth and co-author (with Wallace Thornhill) of The Electric Universe. He is a comparative mythologist in the Velikovsky tradition whose work offers a radical new vantage point on the origin of ancient cultural themes and symbols. His research, motivated by an unpublished manuscript by Immanuel Velikovsky, has been the primary catalyst behind the Saturn Model and is the subject of two documentaries: When the Gods Were Planets and Remembering the End of the World.
teaser: David Talbott explains that electricity, arcing across the solar system, had a powerful effect on events in the ancient world. This may have served as provocation for many of the myths which have persisted across the ages.

title: The Sophia Code with Kaia Ra
body:
Awaken your sovereign divinity by creating bridges of light to step into the sacred space of the seventh dimension. When Kaia Ra connected with and began channeling The Sophia Dragon Tribe, she received The Sophia Code cosmology, which gives one the blueprint for awakening his or her higher self by empowering creative free will. It serves as a sacred text in the movement on the return of Divine Feminine Christ Consciousness. Experience life-changing transcendence through shamanic mentoring.
Kaia Ra is the international bestselling author of The Sophia Code: A Living Transmission from The Sophia Tribe, a celebrated Divine Feminine teacher, and world-renowned Oracle for The Sophia Dragon Tribe®️. Surviving multiple near-death experiences, she was directly initiated by the Ascended Masters and Archangels from childhood for downloading ascension blueprints. Her artistry, live events, media appearances, and online broadcasts are hailed as the next-generation of revolutionary new age leadership.
teaser: When Kaia Ra connected with and began channeling The Sophia Dragon Tribe, she received The Sophia Code, which gives one the blueprint for awakening human consciousness by empowering creative free will.

title: Overcoming the Challenges of Ascension with Lee Harris
body:
As body and being prepare for ascension, a degree of density detox must be endured so that we can become unstuck from our lives. Lee Harris explains that many people are currently experiencing the symptoms of accelerated ascension, which includes letting go of the things which the soul no longer needs and releasing trauma from the body. 

Lee Harris’s journey as a channeler began in 1998 when he heard the voice of Zachary, who was part of a greater collective of 88 spirit guides. During that time, he had nearly daily conversations with this collective which built his skills as a channeler and intuitive. Quite expectantly, this became his full time vocation in 2007. He now leads seminars and retreats all over the world and has worked with over 1700 people.
teaser: Lee Harris explains that many people are currently experiencing the symptoms of accelerated ascension, which includes letting go of the things which the soul no longer needs and releasing trauma from the body.

title: Creating a New Life in an Alternate Reality with Bruce Goldberg
body:
What if you could step out of your present life and into ideal circumstances in a parallel universe? Dr. Bruce Goldberg explains how we can explore the realms beyond time, though the 5th dimension, and discover different outcomes for the turbulent lives we lead. This may sound like the realm of science fiction, but all of this becomes possible through the power of past life regression and future life progression. 

Dr. Bruce Goldberg holds a B.A. degree in Biology and Chemistry, is a Doctor of Dental Surgery from the University of Maryland School of Dentistry, and has a master's degree in Counseling Psychology.
teaser: Dr. Bruce Goldberg explains how we can explore the realms beyond time, though the 5th dimension, and discover different outcomes for the turbulent lives we lead.

title: E.T. Contact Through Remote Viewing with Ed Dames
body: Remote Viewing has proven highly effective for psychic espionage, and it can help us to prepare for extraterrestrial contact. As the world’s foremost Remote Viewing teacher, Major Ed Dames has encountered many strange things, not of this world. He explains that the deep state is controlling information concerning alien contact, and we can bypass these controls by tapping into the universal consciousness to properly prepare ourselves to connect with extraterrestrial beings.
teaser: Major Ed Dames explains that the deep state is controlling information concerning alien contact, and we can bypass these controls using Remote Viewing.
